summary: Looking for the perfect weapon for any occasion? Need something to take out your enemies before they can even get close? Well look no further!
descriptionHtml:
Looking for the perfect weapon for any occasion? Need something to take out your enemies before they can even get close? Well look no further!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Stats: Base damage is 30, ignores 50% of armor, and burns for 100 points of damage over 5 seconds.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates: added Dragonfire Crossbow V2 with a new mesh and Dragonfire Bolts for the bow

Also check out my One Handed Crossbow: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23164/ 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dawnguard is required for this mod
author: D0VAK11N
